results.content:
I have learned some new things from this course about how to develop Wordpress plugins. But I did find that when following along in a particular sections, the code between videos is not consistent.

I like to type my code in, rather than copy and paste as I think this exercise helps you retain knowledge better. There are some big jumps where the tutor introduces some new functions and skims over their purpose.

Would be nice if there was a diagram that explains the theory of how the options page works.
results.content_html:

results.content: The content seems great so far, but the instructors overuse of actually distracts from the course content.
